node.detail_zh: 患者曾參加新華旅遊的西歐團，該團共有逾 30 人，當中包括其妻子。該團於 3 月 4 日至 14 日曾到訪荷蘭、德國、瑞士及法國，抵港後與妻子接受強制家居隔離，該男子於 3 月 17 日起發燒，及後由救護車送往伊利沙伯醫院。
node.detail_en: The patient and his wife attended to a tour in Western Europe, which has more than 30 person.   The tour has visited Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland and France during Mar 4 and Mar 14.  The patient and his wife received home confinement after returning to Hong Kong.  He had fever starting on Mar 17 and was sent to Queen Elizabeth Hospital by an ambulance.

node.location_en: Oi Wai House, Tsz Oi Court

node.remarks_zh: 患者與太太參加新華旅遊一個西歐團，有 32 名團友
node.remarks_en: Patient joined a group tour of  Sunflower Travel to Western Europe, the tour group had 32 people.

node.remarks_zh: 旅行團返港時已被強制檢疫，所有團友和領隊均要家居隔離14日。患者 3 月 17 日發燒，由救護車送到醫院
node.remarks_en: The tour group required mandatory quarantine when returned Hong Kong, The whole tour group was under home quarantine for 14 days.  Patient developed fever on Mar 17, was ambulanced to the hospital.
